mapper.insert: INSERT INTO community(community_id, com_name, com_description, is_private, user_num, community_kate_id) VALUES(seq_community.NEXTVAL, #{com_name}, #{com_description}, #{is_private}, #{user_num}, #{community_kate_id})
mapper.update: UPDATE community SET com_name = #{com_name}, com_description = #{com_description}, is_private = #{is_private}, icon_image = #{icon_image}, banner_image = #{banner_image}, community_kate_id = #{community_kate_id} WHERE community_id = #{community_id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM community_follow WHERE community_id = #{community_id} AND user_num = #{user_num}
DELETE FROM community_favorites WHERE community_id = #{community_id} AND user_num = #{user_num}
mapper.select:
SELECT c.community_id, c.com_name, c.com_description, c.user_num FROM community c
INNER JOIN community_favorites f ON c.community_id = f.community_id WHERE f.user_num = #{user_num}
WHERE ( c.user_num = #{user_num} OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM community_follow w WHERE w.community_id = c.community_id AND w.user_num = #{user_num} ) OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM community_favorites f WHERE f.community_id = c.community_id AND f.user_num = #{user_num} ) )
ORDER BY c.community_id DESC
